item.description:
This months theme is Location Swap!

That's Right Baby! Come on in and Share your Favorite Places to Photograph! Bring a shot or two of a great location you know of along with the address or directions!

Heck bring a couple locations that you know of in the area that are great shooting spots to share with the group and learn about some new places you may not have known are just around the corner from your home!

MeetUp Member Terri has offered to Blog about this too! She says she'll be happy to adapt a piece she wrote about finding great photography locations for our blog!! So please bring the locations and images to share with the group.

We are counting on you - So don't disappoint us! ...and who knows maybe we'll even pick a few locals to have our upcoming click and shoots!

See you Then!
Donna and Scotty
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
